name: Dad's adventures
description:
This is a fan-made game for the Youtube channel Steven He Live. All events within the game are inspired by Steven's dad adventures. 

You are going to start your day by getting ready for school but your journey will not be easy.  Keep your eyes open, fight all enemies, and most importantly, don't be a failure!

 Game Controls

--- Move with: WASD

--- Jump with :  Spacebar

--- Pause with : ESC 

--- Fight with : P 

Note: This game is a FAILURE. If there is any problem while playing, click the ¨Emergency Restart" button within the game to reload any level.
